svg.content: <mxfile modified="2019-07-21T22:17:28.581Z" host="www.draw.io" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:68.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/68.0" etag="TKPUovB2LTo1xl7j3NJ9" version="11.0.1" type="device"><diagram id="Be-PEK0j7Bcbye_zJbs5" name="Page-1"></diagram></mxfile>

g.text: #01 Write a program that uses a structure to store the following inventory information in a file.
#02 Item description, Quantity on hand, Wholesale cost, Retail cost, and Date added to inventory.
#03 The program should have a menu that allows the user to perform the following tasks:
#04 Add new records to the file.
#05 Display any record in the file.
#06 Change any record in the file.
#07 Input validation: The program should not accept quantities or wholesale or retail costs < 0.
#08 Input validation: The program should not accept dates that the programmer determines are unreasonable.
